Text: It was such a simple and fun game, i loved to just take off and land. Too bad we couldn't fly the other planes though.. Does this run in win 7? I had the idea that win95 game either died of incompatibility or someone would just port them to win 7.
god knows how many times i've tried to take on missions. usually, i just end up going back to the second mission where i shoot down my allies XD

@jamesensor if it doesn't work correctly, try right clicking the file and running in compatibility mode.

@Dark_Wind i thought i was the only one who did that. If you look around on that training mission sometimes there's other friendlies, big planes, and f-15's to kill. Have fun!

Can you please seed this?
that's the least you can do and i'll seed it for 3 months.
yeah i'm seeding again. fun old game isn't it?
